Class 3

Jun 29, 2020 - Mon

View On Github Download class file

tag

  • table
  • tr
  • th
  • td

optional tag for table

  • thead
  • tbody
  • tfoot

non-semantic tag in html

  • div - block level element
  • span - inline level element

attributes

  • border is used in table
  • style is used in inline style
  • id for make a tag unique
  • class for common selection

type of style

  • inline style
<h1 style="color: red" >Hello world </h1>
  • internal style
<style>
  h1 {
    color: red;
  }
</style>

css selector

  • 1 - tag selector
h1 {
  color: red;
}

here, h1 - tag
color - property red - value

  • 2 - id selector

id selector start with #

#first-heading {
  color: red;
}
  • 3 - class selector

class selector start with .

.hiru-sir-fav-color {
  color: red;
}

messenger
